_sText:
Okay here is the final release of this map. There should not be anymore issues ^^ (please dont complain anymore, i cant handle it :'( ... HaHa... 

The fixes in v2_fix:

- Changed the speed og the blocks to 30 and made them thinner and changed the delay from 1 to 0.5 ( and i promise you, they will spawn much faster now (thanks for the hint))
- Removed a few props like the long sound file at the end, the trigger explosion (only the one in jail has survived), deleted the sparkles on the laser and removed 1 of the lasers.
- Changed the brightness of light (and yes, i prefer it that way too (thanks)).

Well now the map should be playable again without complains (exept the long map name :/)

----------Original v2 post below-------------

Alright ive made a Version 2 of this map to improve some stuf and make it more fun xD

Improvements in V2:

- Changed the speed on the boxes from 25 to 35.
- Fixed the light in the map, so its not just stuck brightness.
- Made alot of objects into func_detail enitities.
- Added a few models to give more life to it.
- I made some funny options/abilities for those who complete the map. Such as, play sound, trigger explosions (to scare the noobs), lightning On/Off at the end, more weapons (elite gun with full ammo)

I hope you guys like my map now. I really think its pretty fun and i would love to test this map on a server with players on it.

----------Original post below-------------

Well this is my 2nd bhop map... 

Its not so long, but its a pretty funny map i think..

Map created by me.
Custom textures created by me.
Original texture by Valve (i think :/ ) 
Original models by valve ------ll------

Have fun.

Pls tell me what you think about it and how difficult you think it is.
( hopefully i have added the textures right this time )
